meta.description: Maximize the total production of oil using small and large oil wells on 300 acres of land with constraints on drill bits and pollution.

sets.name: WELL_TYPES
sets.description: Types of oil wells available for use.

params.name: production_per_acre
params.description: Barrels of oil produced per acre by each type of well.

params.name: pollution_per_acre
params.description: Units of pollution produced per acre by each type of well.

params.name: drill_bits_per_acre
params.description: Drill bits required per acre by each type of well.

params.name: max_drill_bits
params.description: Maximum number of drill bits available.

vars.name: acres
vars.description: Acres of land used for each type of oil well.

objective.name: max_total_production
objective.description: Maximize the total production of oil.

constraints.name: total_acres_constraint
constraints.description: Total acres used cannot exceed available land.

constraints.name: drill_bits_constraint
constraints.description: Total drill bits used cannot exceed available drill bits.

constraints.name: pollution_constraint
constraints.description: Total pollution produced cannot exceed allowed pollution.
